name: Ancient Gold Dragon
description: The Ancient Gold Dragon is a majestic creature with gleaming gold scales, massive wings, and wise eyes. Known for its kindness and desire to protect, it often resides in high, secluded mountains.
memorable: Its powerful fire breath can reduce entire armies to ash, while its ability to charm and inspire allies enhances its combat capabilities.
goals: Protect the innocent and champion good; often serves as a guardian.
relations: May be encountered with other metallic dragons or serve as a protector to good-aligned creatures.
environment: Typically found in high, secluded mountains.
strengths: Immunity to fire damage; highly intelligent; powerful breath weapons; strong innate spellcasting.
weaknesses: Can be outmaneuvered by agile foes.
attacks: Utilizes devastating bites, claws, and tail attacks, accompanied by powerful breath weapons.
most_powerful_ability: Molten Breath can deal up to 88 fire damage in a broad cone, with additional effects that encase enemies in gold, reducing their speed to zero.
equipment: In humanoid form, it wields a greatsword dealing 17 slashing damage.
senses: Possesses blindsight and exceptional passive perception of 27, indicating superior awareness.
skills: Excels in persuasion and insight, demonstrating both social finesse and combat knowledge.
additional_information: Can breathe air and water, making it amphibious.
Has a golden splendor ability that can charm nearby creatures.
Can change its shape into a humanoid or beast, retaining many traits.
Utilizes legendary actions for tactical advantages, like frightening enemies.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting ability with a high spell save DC of 25, can cast spells like Bless, Healing Word, Banishment, and Greater Restoration.
